dc_title_s: Sketch map showing surface geology about the northern shores of Lakes Huron and Michigan
dc_description_s: Detached from: A geological reconnaissance along the north shore of lakes Huron and Michigan / Israel C. Russell. In Report of the State Board of Geological Survey of Michigan for the year 1904. Lansing: Wynkoop, Hallenbeck, Crawford Co., 1905.; "Annual report for 1904, plate XVI."|18 x 53 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:633,600|General Map Collection
